review: I bought this after a family member told me about it and I'm happy with it. You can watch Netflix, hulu, and many other apps. If you ask "Isn't it like a smart tv?" the answer is yes but it's better since you can use it on any tv that has an hdmi, and it isn't like screen mirroring so you can be on other apps while you are using chromecast.
